ygData.subject: Re: Looking for item
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, folks I have been on this list for a while and well not much has really happened and I am wondering why?  I kinda joined this list so I could learn how
ygData.messageBody:
Well, folks I have been on this list for a while and well not much has really
happened and I am wondering why? I kinda joined this list so I could learn
how to do it. Could any one tell me like what to do to gain skill? What are
the obvious benefits of learning this trade skill compared to tailoring or
smithing? Just anything about pottery knowledge would be great. Or if any
one knows anything like a website I could go to or something it would be
great.

-Rojen level 8 heh Enchanter and Rojer level 13 paladin
